content.prompt: Ed quit his job because he began to fear that his supervisor was spying on him. Ed frequently hears voices criticizing him, but in reality nobody is there. Edâ€™s problems are most consistent with which of the following disorders?

topic.text: 5.4: Selection of Categories of Psychological Disorders

skill.text: 1.A: Apply psychological perspectives, theories, concepts, and research findings to a scenario.
